author: markt
msg: Fix bug 29570. Ant javac task needs temp dir to create temp
file if command line is too long.

author: remm
msg: - Fix tag files (which may be nice from a user perspective, but from an implementation perspective, it's another story).
- The behavior of JDT is completely different from a regular compiler, so it needs a little extra trick to see the tagfile class when compiling.

author: funkman
msg: - Remove maxTagNesting and curTagNesting since they are unused.

author: luehe
msg: Simplified check for existence of JSP by replacing call to context.getResourceAsStream() with context.getResource(), as suggested by Tim Funk

author: kinman
msg: - Fix 31098: Update java keywords for the latest language spec.
